widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (15, 13), size = (40, 40), png = 2), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (70, 0), size = (850, 50), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 34),gFont("Regular", 30)], "itemHeight": 50 }

eLabel.text: Settings poster / backdrop in Event View

Extensions / Weather information / Menu, then add green. When you have entered the location, go down to location code. Search yellow for code, confirm with green (OK), important OK again. Even more important, back with red, otherwise you'll have to start all over again. Now exit with Exit, restart the user interface, possibly a complete restart ..
For the poster display in Event View, press the Right / Left button on the remote control a few times left and right.Then a poster, if available, will be displayed..
Select your skin and press OK to activate the selected skin
